short_description: Coding Ketchup ~ck:\ _ Coding Ketchup offers software solutions to automotive manufacturers, their suppliers and retailers to improve their business performance through Communications and Aftersales.
long_description: Coding Ketchup ~ck:\ _ Coding Ketchup offers software solutions to automotive manufacturers, their suppliers and retailers to improve their business performance through Communications and Aftersales. It was finally time for us to stand apart from Imprimatur and so we are now Coding Ketchup. contact We would love to hear from you whether you would like to talk about our products or joining our team.
